definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: Digital image steganography does have some drawbacks, though.
sentences.chinese: 但是，数码图像隐写术仍然有一定缺点。

sentences.english: How can digitization and technologies such as OAI be used as components of this resource?
sentences.chinese: 如何将OAI等的数码化和技术用作这新资源的元素？

sentences.english: Cameron has supervised the creation of a new high-definition transfer for the DVD.
sentences.chinese: 喀麦隆指导了这部DVD的全新高清晰数码转换。

sentences.english: This paper designs a new kind of self-timer system for the digital camera.
sentences.chinese: 文章设计了一种新型的数码相机自拍系统。

sentences.english: With a digital camera, check the images as you shoot.
sentences.chinese: 如果是数码相机，拍摄完就要检查一下。

sentences.english: Customized multi-character marking on one single sleeve.
sentences.chinese: 在单个套管上根据客户要求定制多字符数码。

sentences.english: Can broadcast check a document and various digital product of USB inner document.
sentences.chinese: 可以播放USB盘文件和各种数码产品内的文件。

sentences.english: Quickly take a picture with DC then hurry back to the warm cart.
sentences.chinese: 匆忙用数码相机拍了张照片就钻回了温暖的车厢里。

sentences.english: After all, few people back then had digital cameras.
sentences.chinese: 毕竟，当时很少有人有数码相机。

sentences.english: Take a jump to see the key features and specifications of latest Sony Cybershot cameras.
sentences.chinese: 采取跳看到的主要功能和规格索尼最新的数码相机。

sentences.english: Joshi's proposed shift significantly moves the economic goalposts for digital print.
sentences.chinese: 乔希提出的举动明显转变经济球门柱的数码印刷。

sentences.english: As an American gadget blog, we seldom cover the world of Brazilian frozen confections.
sentences.chinese: 作为美国的数码博客，我们很少讨论巴西的棒冰。

sentences.english: To nixie tube display key code.
sentences.chinese: 能在数码管上显示键码。

sentences.english: The old camera was so craptastic that I had to buy a digital one.
sentences.chinese: 那个旧的相机太垃圾了，我得买个数码的。

sentences.english: Shenzhen Longshi Digital Electronic Technology Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 深圳市龙视数码电子科技有限公司。

sentences.english: Pumice digital visual design industry is the application of technology services company.
sentences.chinese: 浮石数码是设计行业视觉技术的应用服务公司。
